doc.title: Darci Decorates: How to Cake Decorate - Volume 1
doc.plot: Cake decorating instructions cover: tools, baking cake, preparing smooth frosting, filling and frosting cakes, bordering cakes, decorating and writing on cakes and how to make roses. Darci decorates rainbow cake, balloon cake, candy cakes, round cakes, ribbon cakes and a rose bouquet cake. Each cake has different techniques for decorating the sides of cakes with frosting and sprinkles. Clear close-up shots are used during critical instructions. Includes deleted outtakes, recipes, tool suggestion list and cake size pan guideline.
